headline: Rumors of Shale’s Peak Were Premature
summary: Despite earlier predictions of a peak, US shale oil production is continuing to grow, driven by efficiency gains and a slower energy transition, though challenges remain.

raw.headline: Rumors of Shale’s Peak Were Premature
raw.summary: Despite earlier predictions of a peak, US shale oil production is continuing to grow, driven by efficiency gains and a slower energy transition, though challenges remain.
